Headline: Red Line Trains bypassing 69th Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 69th due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 69th due to police activity.

Shuttle buses are available between 63rd and 79th to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
